title: Ineos Grenadiers bullish on Tour de France revival: ‘We’re very confident we’re a GC winning team’
content:
Former yellow jersey dominator accepts it's a level below Pogačar and Vingegaard, but is plotting its return to the top.

Read the full article at Ineos Grenadiers bullish on Tour de France revival: ‘We’re very confident we’re a GC winning team’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
